example.title: Dating Message
example.program:
answer = input("Hello. Would you dine with me tonight? (Y or N): ")
if answer == 'Y': print("It is my soul that calls upon my name.") print("How silver-sweet sound lovers' tongues by night,") print("Like softest music to attending ears!") print("Thank you! See you outside OUClub at 7pm tonight.") elif answer == 'N': print("It is ok. Perhaps you are busy. Maybe next time") else: print("Maybe you are undecided. Please relax.") print("You may give me a Y or N answer later.")
example.description: Print messages on condition on reply dating request

explain.description: An multi-way if structure with three parts, if part, elif part, and else part
This if code block, defined by aligned indentation, is executed if the condition is true
This elif code block, defined by aligned indentation, is executed if the if condition is false and this condition is true
This else code block, defined by aligned indentation, is executed if the other if and elif conditions are false
If the input is not Yes nor No

subgoal.label: Executed if answer is not Y nor N
